item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 19, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Yuval Noah Harari: Trump’s world of rival fortresses
2. Trump will abandon Ukraine peace talks ‘in days’ without progress, warns Rubio
3. ‘We had to buy them’: old emails haunt Zuckerberg in high-stakes trial
4. China stops buying liquefied natural gas from the US
5. Non-doms quit London private members’ clubs to avoid UK tax links
